item.title: TTS with edge-tts
item.description: I like the read out loud in Edge browser on MacOS, but it’s not available in Linux. Luckily, there is a edge-tts created by rany2 on Github. So, I asked ChatGPT create several scripts to read out the clipboard and convert a txt file to audio. Dependencies: python, pip, pipx, edge-tts, xclip. Took me sometime to install all the deps. Then to use the scripts, just copy some text and run the bash script.
